title: 57 - Live At The Fox Theater
description: Live at the Fox Theater, Karen and Georgia kick off the My Favorite Murder Spring Tour (official title still pending). Onstage in Oakland, they talk about the Speed Freak Killers and the earthquake-fearing Herbert Mullin.
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
